video.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour
video.synopsis: R.L. Stine leads young viewers on a creepy tour of tales featuring life-sized dolls, werewolves and carnival clowns that are stalking children.

episodes.synopsis: When a young girl's new doll takes on a mysterious identity, her brother is forced to save his sister from the terrifying new reality. Part 1 of 2.
episodes.title: Really You: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When a young girl's new doll takes on a mysterious identity, her brother is forced to save his sister from the terrifying new reality. Part 2 of 2.
episodes.title: Really You: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A friendship made between a bullied boy and a mysterious new kid at school leads to school pranks that threaten to get out of hand.
episodes.title: The Dead Body

episodes.synopsis: Tensions run high when a family receives a mysterious gift at Christmas.
episodes.title: A Creature Was Stirring

episodes.synopsis: When a young girl loses her father, she is forced to face her fears and move to a terrifying hotel where the staff have mysterious secrets.
episodes.title: Nightmare Inn

episodes.synopsis: When a teenage girl is faced with a moral dilemma she learns that everything that can be had has a price.
episodes.title: The Red Dress

episodes.synopsis: Two children learn that when cemeteries are disturbed, not everything stays buried.
episodes.title: Ghostly Stare

episodes.synopsis: A family moves into a new home, but the son soon discovers there is something wrong within the walls.
episodes.title: The Walls

episodes.synopsis: An "expert" gamer plays a new game with a twist on level three.
episodes.title: Game Over

episodes.synopsis: A sixth grader who believes in extraterrestrials is approached by two eighth graders who invite him to join a special club.
episodes.title: Alien Candy

episodes.synopsis: Siblings sneak into grandpa's office to play with a mysterious old recorder, and they record their worst fears and play them back. Not a good choice.
episodes.title: Fear Never Knocks

episodes.synopsis: Twelve-year-old Jack Pierce performs an experiment at home, and finds himself saddled with a new best friend: Cheeky the Zombie.
episodes.title: Best Friend Forever

episodes.synopsis: Three friends find a mysterious mask that allows a glimpse into another time where they see a horrible accident they desperately try to prevent.
episodes.title: Black Mask

episodes.synopsis: Alice comes home from boarding school acting odd. Her brother suspects that she is a witch, and tries to thwart her attempts to practice her craft.
episodes.title: My Sister, the Witch

episodes.synopsis: A boy becomes obsessed with catching a mysterious ice cream truck that seems to haunt his neighborhood.
episodes.title: Catching Cold

episodes.synopsis: The two meanest girls at school prank call someone who turns out to be even meaner than they are.
episodes.title: Wrong Number

episodes.synopsis: Christopher is deathly afraid of clowns. Are they really trying to get him or will he finally outgrow this childhood horror?
episodes.title: Afraid of Clowns

episodes.synopsis: Can a handsome boy overcome his fear of the water and convince people there is a shark in the pool?
episodes.title: Pool Shark

episodes.synopsis: Three kids decide the ghost hunter show they watch is lame.
episodes.title: Lights Out

episodes.synopsis: Matt's brother Josh is perfect --- maybe just a little too perfect.
episodes.title: The Perfect Brother

episodes.synopsis: Three friends dare to find out if the myth of a dead girl who can reach through the mirror to "take your face" is really true.
episodes.title: Scary Mary: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Hanna's friends make her call forth the urban legend "Scary Mary" by looking in the mirror and chanting her name. Who knew she might actually show up?
episodes.title: Scary Mary: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A classic film lover named John gets sucked into a 1950s B movie called "I Was a Teenage Tick Monster" playing at a haunted drive-in.
episodes.title: Creature Feature: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Nathan and Lisa get sucked inside the B movie to rescue John and stop evil scientist Dr. Mangle from unleashing his creation on the real world.
episodes.title: Creature Feature: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A bullied boy discovers that he has god-like power over insects and uses them to get revenge on his tormentors, but eventually they turn on him.
episodes.title: Swarmin' Norman

episodes.synopsis: A boy on a plane learns that the Grim Reaper in the form of an old woman is a passenger and the ghost of a millionaire is trying to escape her.
episodes.title: Flight

episodes.synopsis: A girl and her two brothers investigate a pumpkin patch said to be tended to by a farmer who kidnaps children and switches their heads with pumpkins.
episodes.title: Pumpkinhead

episodes.synopsis: When comic book geek Corey is yelled at by his favorite artist, Corey steals his brushes and learns they have the power to turn fantasy into reality.
episodes.title: Brush with Madness

episodes.synopsis: A boy stays home from school because he's sick and ends up fighting a monster in his house. But is it real or all just a dream?
episodes.title: Sick

episodes.synopsis: Two students lead a campaign to change their school's mascot, but when they have to inform the current mascot, they don't know who's in the suit.
episodes.title: Mascot

episodes.synopsis: A girl hates how strict her mother is, right down to rearranging her room. But dark forces haunt her house when she arranges it the way she wants.
episodes.title: Bad Feng Shui

episodes.synopsis: A family moves to a house said to be haunted by a man who went insane during a barbecue -- which may have something to do with a hole in their yard.
episodes.title: The Hole

episodes.synopsis: A group of girls in a cabin keep having a recurring nightmare about a mysterious creature known as the Dream Catcher.
episodes.title: Dreamcatcher

episodes.synopsis: A farmer has trouble ridding her crops of crows, so she buys a scarecrow from a mysterious salesman. But the scarecrow has a disturbing past.
episodes.title: Scarecrow

episodes.synopsis: In a medieval English town ruled by a corrupt sorcerer, two teens named Ned and Sara set out to dethrone the sorcerer and rid him of his magic.
episodes.title: The Most Evil Sorcerer: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Ned and Sara discover that the sorceress who helped them dethrone the evil sorcerer was the one who taught him black magic, Ned takes revenge.
episodes.title: The Most Evil Sorcerer: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As a high school gets ready to put on its musical production of "Hansel and Gretel," rumors run rampant about a "curse" associated with the play.
episodes.title: Stage Fright

episodes.synopsis: Seth has an interest in ancient Egypt, but his excitement over an exhibit of artifacts fades when he realizes he has a lot in common with a mummy.
episodes.title: Night of the Mummy

episodes.synopsis: Like many teenagers, Gracie wants to be popular. But after taking professional headshots to help her become a star, her personality changes.
episodes.title: Headshot

episodes.synopsis: When a young girl rescues a mysterious doll from neighborhood bullies, she fixes it. But it soon becomes clear that the doll is no ordinary plaything.
episodes.title: The Return of Lilly D.
